dt-option.name: columns.searchBuilder.defaultCondition
dt-option.summary: Set a default condition for this column

type.description: When `-init columns.searchBuilder.defaultCondition` is set to a number it will select the option within the select element at the corresponding index.

When `-init columns.searchBuilder.defaultCondition` is set to a string, it will select the option who's token is the same as this string. For example this will be "=", ">" etc. to avoid clashing with `-init i18n` changes.

dt-option.default: The default value of `-init columns.searchBuilder.defaultCondition` is `undefined`. This means that by default the first option in the condition select element will be selected.
dt-option.description: SearchBuilder uses this option to decide which option within the condition select element should be initially selected when a user selects that column to filter. By default SearchBuilder will select the first item in the condition select element, which is typically the condition title.
